trans-unit.source: An activity that demarcates a transaction boundary.
When this activity begins executing, a new <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction> is started if one does not already exist.
trans-unit.target: 이 작업 실행을 새 시작 <xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>아직 없는 경우 시작 됩니다.</xref:System.Transactions.Transaction>

trans-unit.source: The transaction commits when the activity and all other participants in the transaction have completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션의 활동 및 트랜잭션에 다른 모든 참가자가 성공적으로 완료 했을 때 커밋합니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A> activity member of a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> activity that is the child of a TransactionScope will not execute if an unhandled exception propagates past the TransactionScope boundary.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] >는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A>활동 멤버의는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch>TransactionScope 경계 지나서 처리 되지 않은 예외에서 전파는 TransactionScope 자식 활동 실행 되지 것입니다.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch> </xref:System.Activities.Statements.TryCatch.Finally%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> class.
Gets or sets the value that indicates whether the workflow should be aborted if the transaction aborts.
trans-unit.target: 트랜잭션이 중단 되 면 워크플로 중단 해야 하는지 여부를 나타내는 값을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the workflow should be aborted.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우 워크플로 중단 해야 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 활동을 가져오거나 때 예약 되는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The activity that is scheduled when the <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> executes.
trans-unit.target: 활동을 예약 하는 경우는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref> 실행 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
To be added.
To be added.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Transactions.IsolationLevel"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 속성 값은 여야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.IsolationLevel*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*> for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref> should be serialized.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>고, 그렇지 않으면 직렬화 된 속성 값은 여야 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope.Timeout*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 가져오거나는 <xref:System.TimeSpan>이 사용 되는 트랜잭션에 대 한 제한 시간을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
If the value is set at runtime an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
The <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the timeout period for the transaction used for this <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.TimeSpan>이 사용 되는 트랜잭션에 대 한 제한 시간을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Activities.Statements.TransactionScope"> </xref>.</xref:System.TimeSpan>
